name: TheAtlantic
text: “Pandemic school is clearly not working well, especially for younger children,” @ErikaChristakis writes. But parents are coming to understand that school was not always working so great before COVID-19 either. https://t.co/4NXzwicpAi

name: TheAtlantic
text: Coronavirus hospitalizations hit a record high in the United States today, making it clear that the country has entered the worst moment in the pandemic since the spring, @alexismadrigal and @kissane write: https://t.co/tuXwmoJois

name: TheAtlantic
text: "There will be a path to ending the pandemic, but it will be fraught." A COVID-19 vaccine finally looks likely, but can a Biden administration convince Americans to take it? @sarahzhang reports: https://t.co/FffhDmfb52
